00036 class SWModule;
00037 class CSwordBackend;
00038 class CHTMLEntryDisplay;
00039 
00048 class CSwordModuleInfo : public CPointers  {
00049 public:
00050     enum ModuleType {
00051         Bible,
00052         Commentary,
00053         Lexicon,
00054         GenericBook,
00055         Unknown
00056     };
00061   enum UnlockErrorCode {
00062         noError,    /* No error occured, everything worked ok. The key was written to the config*/
00063         wrongUnlockKey, /* The wrong key was used. Module is not unlocked */                
00064         notLocked, /* The module was not locked so it can't be unlocked */
00065         noPermission /* The key was not written to config because we have no permissions*/
00066     };  
00067     enum ConfigEntry {
00068         AboutInformation,
00069         AbsoluteDataPath,
00070         CipherKey,
00071         DataPath,
00072         Description,
00073         ModuleVersion,
00074         MinimumSwordVersion
00075     };
00076     enum Feature {
00077         StrongsNumbers, /*Use for Bibles which have embedded strong numbers*/
00078         GreekDef, /*Hebrew StringsNumbers definitions in a lexicon*/
00079         HebrewDef,
00080         GreekParse,
00081         HebrewParse,
00082         DailyDevotion,
00083         Glossary
00084     };
00085     
00089     const QString config( const ConfigEntry );
00090     
00091     CSwordModuleInfo( SWModule* module );
00092     CSwordModuleInfo( const CSwordModuleInfo& m );  
00093   virtual CSwordModuleInfo* clone();    
00094     virtual ~CSwordModuleInfo();    
00095 
00099   SWModule* const module() const;
00104   const CSwordModuleInfo::UnlockErrorCode unlock( const QString& unlockKey );
00112   CHTMLEntryDisplay* getDisplay() const;
00118   const bool isEncrypted() const;
00123   const bool isLocked();
00124 
00128   const bool hasVersion() const;
00134   virtual const bool search( const QString searchedText, const int searchOptions, ListKey scope, void (*percent)(char, void*));
00139   virtual ListKey& searchResult( const ListKey* newResult = 0 );
00143   virtual void interruptSearch();
00149   void clearSearchResult();
00153   virtual const CSwordModuleInfo::ModuleType type() const;
00158   const SWVersion minimumSwordVersion();
00162   const QString name() const;
00166   const bool isUnicode();
00171   virtual const bool snap() {return false;};
00172   const bool has( const CSwordModuleInfo::Feature );
00173     const bool has( const CSwordBackend::FilterOptions option ) ;
00174 
00175 private:
00176     SWModule*   m_module;
00177     ListKey m_searchResult;
00178 };
00179 
00180 typedef QList<CSwordModuleInfo> ListCSwordModuleInfo;
00181 
00182 inline const CSwordModuleInfo::ModuleType CSwordModuleInfo::type() const {
00183     return CSwordModuleInfo::Unknown;
00184 }
00185 
00186 inline SWModule*const CSwordModuleInfo::module() const {
00187     return m_module;
00188 }
00189 
00190 typedef QList<CSwordModuleInfo> ListCSwordModuleInfo;
